name: Jaburiye
description:
A downloadable demo for Windows

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Roll / Jump obstacles

Right-click - Aim

Left-click - Shoot

Be approved in the hard training test and help your village!

You must pass the test to be allowed to leave the village, but be aware, when out there you are by yourself, check every outsider post and maybe the village leader let you go out on a trip against the demons!

JABURIYE TEAM
